languages.text: Льстивая лояльность Регины Зауэрбэк Вольному Торговцу породила множество скабрезных слухов. Эти кривотолки прервались в день, когда остывшие тела четы Зауэрбэк были найдены в их спальне. Считается, что они пали жертвой интриг дальних родственников, но злые языки шептались, как перед смертью руки Махария, пронзенного ядовитым клинком, переломили тонкую шею его дражайшей супруги.

Regina Sauerback's sugar-tongued loyalty to the Rogue Trader prompted many crude rumours. The gossip stopped one day when the Sauerbacks' cold bodies were found in their bedroom. It is widely believed that they fell victim to the machinations of distant relatives. Yet vicious whispers persist that, at some point between being stabbed by the poisoned blade and succumbing to his wounds, Macharius himself wrung his dear wife's slender neck.
languages.original_text: Льстивая лояльность Регины Зауэрбэк Вольному Торговцу породила множество скабрезных слухов. Эти кривотолки прервались в день, когда остывшие тела четы Зауэрбэк были найдены в их спальне. Считается, что они пали жертвой интриг дальних родственников, но злые языки шептались, как перед смертью руки Махария, пронзенного ядовитым клинком, переломили тонкую шею его дражайшей супруги.

traits.locale_text: Regina Sauerback's sugar-tongued loyalty to the Rogue Trader prompted many uncouth rumours to appear. The gossip stopped one day when the cold bodies of the Sauerback couple were found in their bedroom. It is generally considered that they became victims of machinations of their remote relatives, yet some ill tongues whisper that before death, the hands of Macharius, pierced by a poisoned blade, broke the slender neck of his dear wife.

It is generally considered that they became victims of machinations of their remote relatives, yet some ill tongues whisper that before death, the hands of Macharius, pierced by a poisoned blade, broke the slender neck of his dear wife.

It is widely believed that they became victims of the machinations of their distant relatives. Yet, some tongues whisper that, before death, the hands of Macharius, pierced by poisoned blade, broke the slender neck of his dear wife.

It is widely believed that they fell victim to the machinations of distant relatives. Yet vicious whispers persist that, at some point between being stabbed by the poisoned blade and succumbing to his wounds, Macharius himself wrung his dear wife's slender neck.

It is widely believed that they fell victim to the machinations of distant relatives. languages.text: 蕾吉娜·苏尔贝克对行商浪人的甜言蜜语引发了许多粗俗的谣言。某天，苏尔贝克夫妇冰冷的尸体在卧室中被人发现，谣言也就此终止。人们普遍认为他们沦为了家族远亲阴谋的受害者。但也有恶毒的传言声称，马卡里乌斯被他妻子的毒刃刺伤。他在毒发身亡之前，亲手扭断了爱妻纤细的脖颈。
languages.original_text: Regina Sauerback's sugar-tongued loyalty to the Rogue Trader prompted many crude rumours. The gossip stopped one day when the Sauerbacks' cold bodies were found in their bedroom. It is widely believed that they fell victim to the machinations of distant relatives. Yet vicious whispers persist that, at some point between being stabbed by the poisoned blade and succumbing to his wounds, Macharius himself wrung his dear wife's slender neck.

traits.locale_text: 蕾吉娜·苏尔贝克对行商浪人的甜言蜜语引发了许多粗俗的谣言。某天，苏尔贝克夫妇冰冷的尸体在卧室中被人发现，谣言也就此终止。人们普遍认为，他们沦为了家族远亲阴谋的受害者。但也有传言声称，是马卡里乌斯本人临死前亲手割断了他美丽妻子的喉咙，而他的手也被他妻子的毒刃刺穿。

languages.text: Regina Sauerbacks liebliche Loyalität {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} gegenüber ließ allerlei wilde Gerüchte entstehen. Diese Gerüchte endeten schlagartig, als eines Tages die kalten Leichen der Sauerbacks in ihren Schlafzimmern entdeckt wurden. Man geht gemeinhin davon aus, dass sie Opfer der Intrigen ihrer entfernten Verwandten wurden. Allerdings hielten sich hartnäckige Gerüchte, wonach Macharius seiner werten Gattin den schlanken Hals umdrehte, ehe er selbst von der vergifteten Klinge verletzt wurde und seinen Wunden erlag.
languages.original_text: Regina Sauerback's sugar-tongued loyalty to the Rogue Trader prompted many crude rumours. The gossip stopped one day when the Sauerbacks' cold bodies were found in their bedroom. It is widely believed that they fell victim to the machinations of distant relatives. Yet vicious whispers persist that, at some point between being stabbed by the poisoned blade and succumbing to his wounds, Macharius himself wrung his dear wife's slender neck.

traits.locale_text: Regina Sauerbacks liebliche Loyalität {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} gegenüber ließ allerlei krude Gerüchte entstehen. Diese Gerüchte endeten schlagartig, als eines Tages die kalten Leichen der Sauerbacks in ihrem Schlafzimmer entdeckt wurden. Es wird allgemein davon ausgegangen, dass sie Opfer der Intrigen ihrer entfernten Verwandten geworden sind. Manche munkeln aber auch, dass Macharius, von einer vergifteten Klinge durchbohrt, seiner Frau vor seinem Tod das schlanke Genick gebrochen hat.

languages.text: La loyauté obséquieuse de Régina Sauerback envers {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} suscita de nombreuses rumeurs grossières. Les commérages cessèrent le jour où les cadavres des Sauerback furent retrouvés dans leur chambre. Beaucoup pensent qu'ils furent victimes des machinations de leurs parents éloignés, mais des rumeurs pernicieuses persistent à raconter que Macharius, avant de succomber à la blessure infligée par un poignard empoisonné, avait brisé le cou gracile de sa tendre épouse.
languages.original_text: Regina Sauerback's sugar-tongued loyalty to the Rogue Trader prompted many crude rumours. The gossip stopped one day when the Sauerbacks' cold bodies were found in their bedroom. It is widely believed that they fell victim to the machinations of distant relatives. Yet vicious whispers persist that, at some point between being stabbed by the poisoned blade and succumbing to his wounds, Macharius himself wrung his dear wife's slender neck.

traits.locale_text: La loyauté obséquieuse de Régina Sauerback envers {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} suscita de nombreuses rumeurs grossières. Les commérages cessèrent le jour où les cadavres des Sauerback furent retrouvés dans leur chambre. Beaucoup pensent qu'ils furent victimes des machinations de leurs parents éloignés, mais des rumeurs pernicieuses persistent à raconter que Macharius, avant de succomber à la blessure infligée par un poignard empoisonné, avait brisé le cou gracile de sa tendre épouse.

languages.text: La lealtad endulzada de Regina Sauerback hacia {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente dio pie a numerosos rumores de mal gusto. Las habladurías llegaron a su fin el día en que se encontraron los cuerpos fríos de los Sauerback en su dormitorio. Se cree que cayeron víctima de las intrigas de parientes lejanos, pero algunas lenguas indiscretas susurran que fueron las manos de Macharius, antes de morir por la puñalada de un cuchillo envenenado, las que rompieron el delicado cuello de su querida esposa.
languages.original_text: Regina Sauerback's sugar-tongued loyalty to the Rogue Trader prompted many crude rumours. The gossip stopped one day when the Sauerbacks' cold bodies were found in their bedroom. It is widely believed that they fell victim to the machinations of distant relatives. Yet vicious whispers persist that, at some point between being stabbed by the poisoned blade and succumbing to his wounds, Macharius himself wrung his dear wife's slender neck.

traits.locale_text: La lealtad endulzada de Regina Sauerback hacia {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente dio pie a numerosos rumores de mal gusto. Las habladurías llegaron a su fin el día en que se encontraron los cuerpos fríos de los Sauerback en su dormitorio. Se cree que cayeron víctima de las intrigas de parientes lejanos, pero algunas lenguas indiscretas susurran que, antes de morir, las manos de Macharius, perforadas por un cuchillo envenenado, rompieron el delicado cuello de su querida esposa.

languages.text: レジーナ・ザウアーバックの自由開拓者に対する忠誠心は口先だけのものであったため、下品な噂が絶えなかった。ある日、ザウアーバック夫妻の冷たい遺体が寝室で発見されたことで噂話は途絶えた。彼らは遠い親戚の策略の犠牲になったのだと広く信じられている。しかし毒刃に貫かれてその傷によって生命を落とすまでの間に、マハリウスが愛する妻の細首を折ったという悪質な噂も絶えずに残っている。
languages.original_text: Regina Sauerback's sugar-tongued loyalty to the Rogue Trader prompted many crude rumours. The gossip stopped one day when the Sauerbacks' cold bodies were found in their bedroom. It is widely believed that they fell victim to the machinations of distant relatives. Yet vicious whispers persist that, at some point between being stabbed by the poisoned blade and succumbing to his wounds, Macharius himself wrung his dear wife's slender neck.

traits.locale_text: レジーナ・ザウアーバックの自由開拓者に対する忠誠心は口先だけのものであったため、下品な噂が絶えなかった。ある日、ザウアーバック夫妻の冷たい遺体が寝室で発見されたことで噂話は途絶えた。彼らは遠い親戚の策略の犠牲になったのだと広く信じられている。しかし毒刃に貫かれてその傷によって生命を落とすまでの間に、マハリウスが愛する妻の細首を折ったという悪質な噂も絶えずに残っている。

languages.text: Regina Sauerback'in tatlı dili ve Hür Tacir'e karşı olan sadakati, birçok inceliksiz söylentinin yayılmasına sebep oldu. Söylentiler, Sauerbacklerin soğumuş cesetleri yatak odalarında bulunduğunda birdenbire kesildi. Genel inanış, uzak akrabaların komplolarına kurban gitmiş oldukları üzerineydi. Birtakım habis fısıltılar ise zehirli bir hançerle bıçaklanan Macharius'un, yaralarına kurban gitmeden önce sevgili eşinin ince boynunu kırıverdiğinden söz ediyordu.
languages.original_text: Regina Sauerback's sugar-tongued loyalty to the Rogue Trader prompted many crude rumours. The gossip stopped one day when the Sauerbacks' cold bodies were found in their bedroom. It is widely believed that they fell victim to the machinations of distant relatives. Yet vicious whispers persist that, at some point between being stabbed by the poisoned blade and succumbing to his wounds, Macharius himself wrung his dear wife's slender neck.

traits.locale_text: Regina Sauerback'in tatlı dili ve Hür Tacir'e karşı olan sadakati birçok inceliksiz söylentinin yayılmasına sebep oldu. Söylentiler, Sauerbacklerin soğumuş cesetleri yatak odalarında bulunduğunda birdenbire kesildi. Genel inanış, uzak akrabaların dolaplarına kurban gitmiş oldukları üzerineydi. Ancak bazı habis fısıltılarda, zehirli bir hançerle bıçaklanan Macharius'un, yaralarına kurban gitmeden önce sevgili eşinin ince boynunu kırıverdiği anlatılıyordu.
